sentence: Four other congressional candidates also attended Trump's rally: Audra Johnson, who's challenging Republican Peter Meijer in Michigan's 3rd District, Annie Black in Nevada's 4th District, Jo Rae Perkins, a Republican Senate candidate in Oregon linked to the QAnon conspiracy group and Colorado State Representative Ron Hanks, who's running for Colorado's U.S. Senate seat.
author: Aaron Navarro
title: Over 30 people who rallied in Washington on January 6, 2021 are running for state and federal offices

sentence: Share this - Allan Smith 9h ago / 8:32 PM UTC GOP Rep. who voted to impeach Trump shares video of House evacuation Rep. Peter Meijer, R-Mich., posted to Twitter a video he shot from the House gallery as the chamber was being evacuated during the Capitol riot.
title: Jan. 6 Capitol riot: Full anniversary coverage

sentence: While the U.S. military is no longer present in Afghanistan, our mission there is not over," said Republican Representative Peter Meijer, who last year co-sponsored legislation that would expand the SIV program and ask the administration to prioritize the evacuation of P-2 applicants from Afghanistan.
author: Masood Farivar
title: Few Afghan Refugees Relocating to US Under 'P-2' Program

sentence: My only hope is to live and help my children get to a better place.'? Fahima, an Afghan mother with three teenagers now living illegally in Pakistan Rep. Peter Meijer (R., Mich.) said there was a tremendous amount of confusion? about which path Afghans should try to reach the U.S. We know there are these other programs that can take years.
author: Michelle Hackman
title: Thousands of Afghans Face Narrow Path to Gain Entry to U.S.

sentence: Scalise gave money in September to at least three House members who voted to impeach Trump: Peter Meijer of Michigan and Jaime Herrera Beutler of Washington state - who are both facing Trump-endorsed challengers - as well as David Valadao of California.
author: Alexandra Ulmer
title: Republican U.S. lawmakers funnel money to colleagues who crossed Trump

sentence: From the January/February 2022 issue: Tim Alberta on Peter Meijer and what the GOP does to its own dissenters There are different truths in politicsTrumps truth, Bidens truth, whatever, B.J.
author: Tim Alberta
title: How Politics Poisoned the Evangelical Church
